name: Golisco: Alcide Assault
description:
Golisco was an octopus who loved methamphetamine so much, but he was as poor as a clam. After have smoked/swallowed (inglutendo) drugs (well, how meth works I don't know) he killed his best friend Alcide who come back from hell to kill him in his sleep.

All this teaches us: Never kill a man called Alcide!
